title: I got my pixel 3 in November only one speaker works when the phone rings or when the alarm clock is used to work on media like YouTube or whatever.in December I read that there was going to be a fixed coming out in an update in the next couple months for this problem I have yet to have this problem fixed with all of the updates that have been put through. Last week I got the April update and now I believe the phone is starting the flashing issue that people are starting to have it didn't do it before the update but it's doing it after the update what can I do about these issues.I absolutely hate this phone because of the speaker problem other than that it's okay but I'm ready to go back to my Samsung Galaxy if these issues can't be resolved ASAP
content: Only one of my speakers works for ringing and alarm clock I have yet to have an update fix this problem although I read in December that there would be an update coming through for that I just received the April update and now I believe I am experiencing the flash's that people have been talking about I did not have that problem before the update came through I'm ready to go back to my Galaxy phone unless these issues can be resolved ASAP I feel like going on what is this
